code:
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic w,
    input logic R,
    input logic E,
    input logic L,
    output logic Q
);
    always_ff @(posedge clk) begin
        if (L) begin
            Q <= R;
        end else if (E) begin
            Q <= w;
        end
        // If neither L nor E is asserted, Q retains its value
    end
endmodule
```
